## Description
Add a comprehensive front-end widget system with drag-and-drop functionality and user preferences persistence.

## Widget Types
- Statistics widgets (subtitle counts, provider usage)
- Recent activity feed
- System status monitors
- Quick actions
- Custom user widgets

## Technical Requirements
### Frontend
- React-based widget framework
- Drag-and-drop grid system (react-grid-layout)
- Widget state management (Redux/Zustand)
- Responsive design for mobile
- Real-time updates via WebSocket

### Backend
- Widget configuration API
- User preferences storage
- Widget data endpoints
- Security validation
- Performance optimization

### Database
- Widget layout storage (PostgreSQL/SQLite)
- User preferences table
- Widget permissions model
- Default layouts table

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Users can add/remove widgets from dashboard
- [ ] Widget positions are saved per user
- [ ] Drag-and-drop repositioning works smoothly
- [ ] Widgets update in real-time
- [ ] Mobile responsive with stack layout
- [ ] Widget permissions restrict access appropriately
- [ ] Default layouts for new users
- [ ] Export/import widget configurations
- [ ] Performance remains smooth with 20+ widgets
- [ ] Accessibility compliant (WCAG 2.1 AA)

## Security Requirements
- Widget data access follows user permissions
- XSS protection for custom widgets
- Rate limiting on widget API endpoints
- Audit logging for configuration changes

## UI/UX Requirements
- Smooth animations during drag-and-drop
- Loading states for widget data
- Error boundaries for widget failures
- Customization panel for widget settings
- Widget library/marketplace UI

## Testing Requirements
- Unit tests for widget components
- Integration tests for drag-and-drop
- E2E tests for full dashboard scenarios
- Performance tests with many widgets
- Security tests for access control
